subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After finishing 19-12 and playing in the Women’s National Invitation Tournament last season, Hofstra is off to an 8-1 start under the first-year coach Krista Kilburn-Steveskey.
snippet: After finishing 19-12 and playing in the Women’s National Invitation Tournament last season, Hofstra is off to an 8-1 start under the first-year coach Krista Kilburn-Steveskey.
